scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a bust of a bearded man wearing a wide-brimmed hat adorned with a gold emblem and a feather. He is draped in a blue cloak over a pink garment. His right hand rests on a golden staff or scepter. A golden halo encircles his head, suggesting a saintly or royal figure. The scene is framed by an arched architectural element with gold ornamentation, set against a blue background.
